availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Owen County, Kentucky, carpenter. Kentucky native. Son of Charles Neal and Elizabeth Neal. Married to Harriet Marquess in Grant County, Kentucky on July 30, 1848. Father of Mary E. Neal, Francis M. Neal, John W. Neal, Susan E. Neal, Sephrona J. Neal, Charles L. Neal, and Anna Neal. Carpenter in Grant County in 1850. Carpenter in Owen County, Kentucky in 1860. Mentioned in the petition of John Marques in Grant County, Kentucky dated December 1, 1863.

ab.bibl:
